body:
- Drush site-install fails with MySQL 8 [#4259](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4259) 
- Adding extra information about symlinked packaged commands, see [#4290](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4290)
- Tolerate an unrecognized DB Driver during site:install and bootstrap [#4295](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4295)
- Change from an exception to warning in site:install f93ee99
- Better error message when dropping tables. 4906f6c 
- Remove unused SqlBase::delete f5dc954 
- Bump Unish's Drupal 9 testing to PHP 7.3 f10313c 
- Stop using CONFIG_SYNC_DIRECTORY. ([#4301](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4301))
- Fix [#4098](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4098). In Drush config, stop using sql.db-su in favor of just db-su. ([#4302](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4302)). 
- Fix [#4275](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4275). Adjust install instructions for recommended-project.

- Add Usage example to sql:query linking to [#3071](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3071).
- Remove unhelpful help text after drush terminated abnormally.
- Change log level to debug for 'broaden constraint' warning.
- Bring back drush_log() to avoid fatal errors from older commandfiles.

- Add `cache:tags` command to purge content by tag. ([#4267](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4267)) 
- Allow symfony/var-dumper version 5. 637f2aa
- Fix [#4256](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4256). Insufficient Error messages on failing SQL commands during site:install
- Use entity_field.manager in user field sanitize plugin. Drupal 9 compat. [#4270](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4270)
- More Drupal 9 compat [#4272](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4272) [#4273](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4273) 
- Use PHP 7.3.7 exclusively at Appveyor. [#4271](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4271)
- Fix userTest on Windows. 493467f 
- Improve rsync confirm message aa47e57a
- Stop sending â€”backend during sql:sync calls ([#4247](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4247))
- site:install doesn't re-use a db connection already in settings.php ([#4244](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4244))

Drush 10 removes many deprecated APIs and functions. It's lean and clean. Drush 10 works great with improvements in the upcoming Drupal 8.8, like the new [Config Transform](https://www.drupal.org/node/3066005) and [Exclude](https://www.drupal.org/node/3079028) APIs.

Commandfiles written for Drush 9 are often already compatible with Drush 10. All you should do is expand the constraint in your module's composer.json (see `extra/drush` section). See [this patch from Devel module](https://www.drupal.org/project/devel/issues/3071228). Commandfiles that aren't part of modules don't need any composer.json changes.

Drush 10 should work fine when making remote calls into a Drush 9.6+ environment. This helps during the brief period when you upgrade to Drush 10 locally but still need to make calls into a Prod instance that is still on Drush 9.

name: 10.0.0-rc5
body:
- Allow Robo 2 ([#4206](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4206))
- Fix arguments in pm:security test.

name: 10.0.0-rc4
body:
-  Fix [#3903](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3903). Remove default DatabaseConnection during early bootstrap in site:install ([#4230](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4230))
-  Initial Drupal 9 compat. ([#4232](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4232))

name: 10.0.0-rc3
body:
- Better message when sql program doesnt exist and Drupal fails to install ([#4185](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4185))
- [#4194](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4194): drush config:status does not respect excluded modules ([#4201](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4201))
- Replace classy with stark in EnDisUnListInfoCase::testEnDisUnList ([#4202](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4202))
- Fix warning in site:install c875694 
- Issue-3636: Generate sample values only for supported field types. ([#4198](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4198))
- Issue-4208: Fix User:login command incorrect url handling ([#4209](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4209))
- Add option to exclude entities by ID to entity:delete command. ([#4175](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4175))
- Calculate memory_limit correctly when there is no suffix ([#4187](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4187)) 
- Add --items-limit option to queue:run command ([#4121](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4121)) 
- Use the UpdateKernel for config:import. ([#4217](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4217))
- Remove drush init from install docs. Its a relic. ([#4222](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4222)) 
- Closes [#4071](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4071) by setting -y to sql-sync command ([#4223](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4223)) 
- Clear the config cache after a config import ([#4224](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4224)) 
- Fix config import with `--partial` ([#4228](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4228))

name: 10.0.0-rc2
body:
- Drush commandfile generator should declare 10 as compat version 5d72735 
- Reduce commandfile compat errors from warning to info. ([#4176](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4176)) 
- Still load incompat commandfiles ([#4179](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4179)) 
- Add unix socket configuration to mysql credentials ([#4173](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4173))

name: 10.0.0-rc1
body:
Drush 10 removes many deprecated APIs and functions. It's lean and clean. Drush 10 has no new commands/features relative to Drush 9.7.

Commandfiles written for Drush 9 are likely already compatible with Drush 10. All you must do is expand the constraint in your module's composer.json (see `extra/drush` section). See [this patch from Devel module](https://www.drupal.org/project/devel/issues/3071228). Commandfiles that aren't part of modules don't need any composer.json changes.

Drush 10 should work fine when making remote calls into a Drush 9.6+ environment. Please report any bugs.

Your feedback is most appreciated.

- Fix [#4152](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4152) symfony/event_dispatcher version requirements
- Fix [#4160](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4160). Make method non-static. ([#4161](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4161)) 
- Expand examples for drush ssh command. 88d5b0c 
- Rename .twig to .[type].twig for better syntax highting in editor. ([#4163](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4163))
- Do not throw exception if cron is already running ([#4162](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4162)) 
- Drupal 8.8 for Highest test (functional) ([#4164](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4164)) 
- Run integration and unit tests at Circle ([#4165](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4165)) 
- Change config import and export commands to use the new core API ([#4061](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4061))
- Use CAPS for env variables in examples. ([#4167](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4167))

name: 10.0.0-beta1
body:
A few minor improvements since [alpha1](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/releases/tag/10.0.0-alpha1)

- Constrain our minimum version of webflo/drupal-finder to 1.2 or later c34e6f5 
- Profiling info in Logger ([#4147](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4147)) 4933680 
- Fix Request to have correct base URL ([#4136](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4136)) 
- Escape rsync params. ([#4150](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4150)) 7d4d659

name: 10.0.0-alpha1
body:
Drush 10 removes many deprecated APIs and functions. It's lean and clean. Drush 10 has no new commands/features relative to Drush 9.7.

Commandfiles written for Drush 9 are likely already compatible with Drush 10. All you must do is expand the constraint in your module's composer.json (see `extra/drush` section). See [this patch from Devel module](https://www.drupal.org/project/devel/issues/3071228).

Drush 10 should work fine when making remote calls into a Drush 9.6+ environment. Please report any bugs.

Your feedback is most appreciated.
- Support Drush wildcard aliases. ([#4109](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4109))

- Improve safety/robustness of config:pull so that it halts if the export fails. 2737f70
- Fix [#4070](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4070). Drush should warn when running entity-updates on Drupal 8.7+ 2716512
- Fix updatedb --entity-updates flag in Drupal 8.7+ ([#4108](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4108)) d17e067
- Fixes [#4092](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4092), [#4100](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4100): Adds test for db imports via sql:cli 87b93c9

Highlights
==============
- Add jsonapi command ([#4045](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4045))
- Fix TTY detection for runserver command. ([#4033](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4033))
- Add Vagrant transport to Drush. ([#4036](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4036))
- Fixes [#4034](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4034): Ensure that status code is nonzero on invalid shutdown ([#4037](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4037))

Small Wins
========
- Reduce the useless verbosity of batch update output ([#3372](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3372)) ([#4090](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4090))
- Fix misleading usage examples for config:set and config:delete commands ([#4085](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4085))
- Fixed usage docs for user-add-role. ([#4088](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4088))
- Document how to show current site alias in Zsh prompt ([#4086](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4086))
- Remove mentions of Shippable. ([#4079](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4079))
- Add mysql service to Travis config. ([#4078](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4078))
- More docs about dynamic users in site.yml files.
- Fix [#4055](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4055). Better sorting of commands in help list. ([#4057](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4057))
- Print class name in drush_op() for better verbose logs
- Update dependencies. ([#4051](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4051))
- UNISH_NO_TIMEOUTS is unused since we moved to CLITrait. ([#4047](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4047))
- Add webflo/drupal-core-require-dev ([#4041](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4041))

This release brings in a [bug fix in site-process library](https://github.com/consolidation/site-process/pull/38), as well as:

- Fix [#2909](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/2909): Relative root paths no longer seem to work ([#4019](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4019))
- [#4020](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4020) Added --uid and --mail options for the drush user:login command
- Fixes [#4004](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4004): Do not set tty mode if stdout is redirected. ([#4028](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4028))
- No timeout by default in DrushTT. ([#4029](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4029)) 
- Fix sql-dump log message ([#4030](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4030))

A few nice enhancements in this patch release. See below. Also see the release notes for 9.6.0 for much more new goodies. 

- Fixes [#3997](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3997): Pass --db-su through to sql methods ([#3998](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3998))
- Let site:install work with just PDO and no shell commands. ([#3999](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3999))
- Add Drush Test Traits ([#4003](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4003)) and Auto set user agent for contrib modules using DrushTT. ([#4013](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4013))
- sql:sync shouldn't crash due to leftover files. ([#4011](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4011))
- Fix [#4015](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4015). Drush 9.6 runserver TTY mode requires /dev/tty to be read/writable
- Remove usage of deprecated method defaultQuestions ([#4001](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/4001))

This release features significant new features and a major refactor of our site alias remote communication. If Drush had a marketing department, they would have insisted on the number 10.0. We don't, so 9.6 it is. We did our very best to preserve existing APIs - please report any breakage.

Highlights
============
- Deprecate drush_invoke_process(), backend.inc and context.inc. These are no longer used by Drush core and commandfiles are encouraged to use their replacements like Drush::drush(). These APIs will be removed in Drush 10. This is a HUGE win for the maintainability of Drush. [#3758](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3758)
- Site aliases may now point into a Docker container [#3835](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3835)
- Now 100% âœ…  on Windows. All PRs tested for regressions (via Appveyor).
- Now 100% âœ… for sqlite and postgres databases. Mysql has always been âœ…. Our test bots run these tests every night.
- Add --filter to many commands ([#3718](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3718)). You may now filter output from any tabular commands. An example: `drush pm:list --filter=ctools`. [See docs for details and general info about output formats](http://docs.drush.org/en/master/output-formats-filters/).
- Unish, our test framework, can now run integration tests without a heavy setUp(). Tests are being ported over.
- Use Drupal DB during bootstrap instead of CLI ([#3800](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3800)). This enables you to run all but the sql:* commands without the mysql client. Useful for minimalist Docker environments.


Other Noteable Changes
=======================
- Fix significant bug where pm:security misses required security updates. ([#3766](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3766))
- Allow Symfony Console commands to be used in php:cli. ([#3770](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3770)). Did you know that Drush can discover and run standard Symfony Console commands?
- Document how to deal with dynamic usernames in a site.yml file. 9fb7658
- Obsolete the unused and unmaintained core:execute command. Use site:ssh instead. ([#3803](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3803))
- Add ssh.pipefail config and use it in sql:dump --gzip ([#3818](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3818))
- PGPASSFILE passed via Process not on commandline ([#3833](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3833))
- Use --uri from commandline over uri in an alias ([#3966](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3966))

This release fixes a few minor bugs from the previous release.

* Fix $this being used in a static context in Drush.php by Evgeny Chernyavskiy ([#3994](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3994))
* Fix backported command aliases: some that had too many ':'s should have been using '-'s instead. ([#3991](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3991))
* Move code to get version directly to the static access methods in case someone (e.g. a module) calls them directly. ([#3990](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3990))
* Bump minimum version of consolidation/annotated-command to 2.12.0 by Brandon Williams

name: 9.6.0-rc6
body:
- Consider parent directories of site roots when searching for alias path c7f062b
- Use --format=json in sql:sync ([#3936](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3936))
- Document php:script supports stdin scripts ([#3984](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3984))
- Skip testLanguageAddWithTranslations() when using a dev snapshot of devel
- Don't call bootstrapValidate commands repeatedly, and add --uri tests 70f75ea
- Do not setInput on the process object unless STDIN actually was redirection 4d7c302
- Pin minimum version of consolidation/annotated-command to ^2.12 ([#3992](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3992))

name: 9.6.0-rc5
body:
- Reduce DCG min version so as to allow symfony/filesystem:2 ([#3973](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3973)) 
- Use --uri from commandline over uri in an alias ([#3966](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3966)) 
- Declare $previous as an \Exception rather than a \Throwable in UserAbortException for PHP 5.x compatibility. Add a unit test. ([#3974](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3974))

This release updates the Drush `pm-*` commands to use supported URLs when fetching releases from Drupal.org. Previous versions of Drush use URLs that are being decommissioned; all users must upgrade.

- Drupalorg updates ([#3915](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3915))
- Add adaptors for the alias manager and the process manager to provide these Drush 9 APIs for Drush 8 extensions ([#3976](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3976))
- Improve consistency of command files between Drush 9 and Drush 8: ([#3928](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3928))
- file_get_stream_wrappers cache poisoning in update_check_requirements() ([#3789](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3789))
- Fix boolean logic check of --local option for commands ([#3777](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3777))
- Guard against bad return value in config-pull

name: 9.6.0-rc4
body:
We now run full test suite on a Windows host! This rounds out our big testing push, which added postgres and sqlite testing a couple months ago.

- DB prefix ignored when installing site. ([#3920](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3920)) 
- Detect os to fix 'sql-query does not work on Windows' ([#3886](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3886))
- Update supported Drupal Versions explanation ([#3937](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3937))
- Namespaced includes ([#3932](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3932)) 
- Continue [#3166](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3166). Fix script name when Drupal uses a domain + subdir
- Add testing of all PRs on Windows (via Appveyor)
- Fixes [#3943](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3943): Better quoting when pipefail is used with sql:dump ([#3965](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3965))

name: 9.6.0-rc3
body:
- Remove spurious second call to 'mustRun' in sql:cli f0b17d1
- Fix [#3895](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3895). drush ssh --cd does not chdir for remote calls ([#3904](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3904)) 0306eb4
- Fix [#3894](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3894). Assume pre-escaped for single arg calls to ssh command. b0a3620
- Fix [#3897](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3897). Allow multiple topics for commands. ([#3907](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3907)) 15950ff
- Remove extra param in log msg. 0af6535
- Remove respawn after 50% memory exhaustion during batch processing. 92b2359

name: 9.6.0-rc2
body:
- Fix: Process whitelisting of fields correctly ([#3882](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3882))
- Set Drupal root context for backward compat. ([#3887](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3887)) 
- Do one setup for locale tests. ([#3889](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3889)) 
- Fix logging and status checking in Integration tests ([#3890](https://github.com/drush-ops/drush/issues/3890)) 
- Don't use DI in a static method. eb0e84e
